headline: McDonald's is the latest company to roll back diversity goals
summary: Four years after launching a push for more diversity in its ranks, McDonald’s is ending some of its diversity practices, citing a U.S. Supreme Court decision that outlawed affirmative action in college admissions.  McDonald's is the latest big company to shift its tactics in the wake of the 2023 ruling and a conservative backlash against diversity, equity and inclusion programs.  Walmart, John Deere, Harley-Davidson and others rolled back their DEI initiatives last year.

headline: McDonald's introducing new McValue menu as food inflation persists
summary: As American consumers continue to deal with elevated food inflation in 2025, fast food chain McDonald's (MCD) is offering a new McValue menu, its first national value program since 2018. Yahoo Finance senior reporter Brooke DiPalma breaks down what this menu platform will include — from value deals to in-app exclusives — as Americans also contend with the rising costs of dining and ordering out. Catch Yahoo Finance's interview with former USDA economist Richard Volpe about the rising costs in food and grocery prices. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.
